item.title: Basics
item.description: Generally speaking there are a few pieces’ of hardware you need, and will be found in basically every machine GPU (often optional or integrated into CPU); What actually renders frames to the monitor that you see.

item.title: CPU (TODO)
item.description: The “brain” of the computer. This is what essentially tells your computer what to do, and helps coordinates operations between other parts of your computer.

item.title: Connection Types (TODO)
item.description: There are tons of ways of connecting your PC to peripherals (devices outside your PC).
